effect.name: SharpenMask
effect.description: Sharpens the bottom layer according to the lightness of the top layer. Blend Coef works differently in DX11 Premultiplied.
effect.author: Sketchy (based on "CS_Sharpen" shader by Sphax - Flavien Clermont) DX11 port by NaitorStudios

parameter.name: Sharpen
parameter.description: Maximum amount to sharpen (corresponding to lightness of 255)
